description.text: Determines statistics for a given data set.

float.name: Mean
float.descr: The mean of the data values.

float.name: Minimum
float.descr: The minimum of the data values.

float.name: Maximum
float.descr: The maximum of the data values.

float.name: Variance
float.descr: The variance of the data values.

float.name: Standard deviation
float.descr: The standard deviation of the data values.

float.name: Median
float.descr: The median of the data values.

float.name: Absolute deviation
float.descr: The absolute deviation of the data values.

float.name: Skewness
float.descr: The skewness of the data values.

float.name: Kurtosis
float.descr: The kurtosis of the data values.
